text:
NEWS: Elon Musk says AI will make all content.

Not in decades. But in 6 years:

And it’s already happening.

☑ in 2020, only 5% of content was made by AI.
☑ in 2025, over 52% of the internet is written by AI.

This is how I best prepare to it.

1. Don’t ignore the trend.
2. Use AI to make your work faster.
3. Start here: https://lnkd.in/dFfS3HxJ.
4. Learn faster with AI: https://lnkd.in/ddmEyKsn.
5. Train GPT to be you: https://lnkd.in/dSzFBSTh.
6. How to best search: https://lnkd.in/dTZRgink.
7. Write better prompts: https://lnkd.in/dd3yfhAJ.

✦ Video edited by opus.pro
✦ Subscribe to my newsletter at how-to-ai.guide.

---

Can you spot AI content?
